rules_text: Whenever this creature attacks, remove a counter from any number of permanents you control. If you do, amass X, where X is the number of counters removed from permanents this turn. [i](To amass X, where X, create X +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It's also a X, where. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black X, where Army creature token first.)[/i]
